name: OddyTree
description:
Your forest is dying! Start your journey over to the flourishing birch forest on the other side of the small swedish village, but pay attention, trees are not made for walking, so keeping your balance will be a challenge!

Controls

Foot-movement: WASD

Balancing: Arrow Keys

Oddytree was made in four days for Indie Schooltrip Game Jam at Spelkolletivet, Sweden. Huge thanks to our Hosts for making this awesome experience possible! Thanks to all other participants for the great time!

Best,

Aileen Auerbach - Game Design, Programming

Richard Kubusch - Level Design, Game Art

Zwi Zausch - Game Design, Game Art, FX
